text: Hi  I‚Äôm thinking to invest using CPF-OA and looking at Amundi Prime. Not sure is a good time seeing the dip?
Anyone received their physical chocolate finance card? I applied the day it was released and till now did not receive it...
Oh that's quite long. I applied on 5 Feb and got it on 25 Feb.
I applied on 10 Feb and still haven't received also :(
Was going to bring to japan end of this month.. dunno if can get it before my trip alr üòï
I have been waiting for weeks but still not received yet ü§î
Paywave or card insert. Some places in Japan don't have apple pay/google pay
same here...i've been waiting for the past 1mth!
it seemed that Chocolate Finance cant cope with the overwhelming request for the physical card? this will cause a detrimental image for them?
the card cannot add to samsung pay
I have received.  I have link with hey max too  do I need to pay thru hey max  or I can just use the card . It will record down the transaction?

What is the use case of physical chocolate card if already using tagging it with Apple Pay / Google pay?Initially  I thought physical chocolate card can be used to tap bus/mrt.. but understand that is not possible.
ü§£ü§£ waiting for the next time someone asks  "is chocolate finance app down?"
For places that don't accept Apple/Google Pay but still accepts physical card contactless?
Yes  last time I tried amaze on Google pay cannot. But tap physical card ok  that's why I wanted to bring the physical chocolate card over
Why need physical card  when u can save it on Google pay or etc.. The card info is on the app anyway.
some places overseas dun allow google pay
Some countries don't have widespread acceptance of mobile contactless e.g. Japan
I see.. I meant more for payment online or locally.. I wouldn't use this card for overseas as it is still a debit card.
Japan really still need physical card to tap. As I went kagoshima last Oct. All must use physical card to tap in order for the transaction to go through.
Why not possible for simply go?
Without fx fees and gives rewards on almost everything. If locally or payment online there are so much more better cards out there if the transactions are not excluded.

Hi  debating to opening HSBC EGA  but I‚Äôm still confused on how the bonus interest works:- For the 1% from the Everyday+ program  do u need to send the SMS to activate it every month?- For the Bonus Interest promotion (is like +2.85% for the current promo from March - May)  is the 2.85% interest for all fresh funds deposited in the first month (March)  or will it apply to fresh funds deposited during April and May too?
For 1% everyday+  you don't need to send sms.At the moment  accounts opened in 2025 onwards are not eligible for bonus interest promotion.
Oh  well then I guess I‚Äôm asking when it‚Äôs eligible  is that how it works?So then how do u ensure u always have the 1% from everyday+ (and also the 1% cashback from Giro transfers?)

For 1% cashback  i have automatic transfer. 1x 2000$ in and 5x 400$ back out beginning of each month.For bonus interest  my understanding its 2.85% freshfund compared to benchmark month. Will be Feb for Mar-May registration.
Topping up SimplyGo doesn‚Äôt earn chocolate miles.No?
topping up explicitly excluded. but can still tap the card for bus/mrt
Chocolate card can tap for bus / Mrt?
So is it I have to wait till the current promo is over before I can qualify for the bonus interest next round? Cause assuming I open now  it wouldn‚Äôt be new when the new promo is announced?
Don‚Äôt think u get BI for new accounts . Just the 1%

Bonus interest is based on when one sends sms so you can open anytime. Just need to lower ur balance (to min 2k) before the month you want to register.However  it's moot as new account is not eligible anyway.
So I have to wait till my account isn‚Äôt new anymore next promotion  basically? Or when will new users be eligible for BI again

As of now  account opened after 2025 is not eligible. And nobody knows when HSBC will introduce new promotions for them.In the mean time  can still open HSBC ega for giro 1% cashback for bills. It's good.

Hi guys a noob question. How do I get krisflyer miles on my uob krisflyer card? Like do I get uni$   or how?
UOB Krisflyer will earn Krisflyer miles. Other uob miles cards will earn uni$
